description:
This topic describes how to configure the health check feature for a Cloud Enterprise Network (CEN) instance. 
After you attach a Virtual Border Router (VBR) to the CEN instance and configure the health check feature, you can monitor the network conditions of the on-premises data center connected to the VBR.

For information about CEN VBR HealthCheck and how to use it, see [Manage CEN VBR HealthCheck](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/doc-detail/71141.htm).

-> **NOTE:** Available in 1.88.0+

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

CenId.description: The ID of the CEN instance.

HealthCheckInterval.description: Specifies the interval at which the health check sends continuous detection packets. Default value: 2. Value range: 2 to 3.

HealthCheckSourceIp.description: The source IP address of health checks.

HealthCheckTargetIp.description: The destination IP address of health checks.

HealthyThreshold.description: Specifies the number of probe messages sent by the health check. Default value: 8. Value range: 3 to 8.

VbrInstanceOwnerId.description: The ID of the account to which the VBR belongs.

VbrInstanceRegionId.description: The ID of the region to which the VBR belongs.
